name: Plumbing Disaster
description:
Click on the pipes to rotate them and form a path from IN to OUT, then click PUMP to complete. Shorter paths and quicker fixing will get you a lower completion time. Note, some randomised pipe configurations may not be possible to complete at all. In such cases or if you simply get tired of trying to solve a pipe layout generation, you can press the SKIP button to generate a new random arrangement of pipes.

Very simple randomly-generated pipe fixing game I made a long, long time ago when I was learning SDL 2. You can check out the source code at https://github.com/SpectralCascade/plumbing_disaster
